subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2012)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Livorno soccer players honored Piermario Morosini, who collapsed and died on the field on Saturday, at a ceremony in Leghorn, Italy; and the Monte-Carlo Rolex Masters tournament continued in France.
snippet: Livorno soccer players honored Piermario Morosini, who collapsed and died on the field on Saturday, at a ceremony in Leghorn, Italy; and the Monte-Carlo Rolex Masters tournament continued in France.
